General.Name: Zoy Home Furnishing Co Ltd
General.Description: ZOY Home Furnishing Co.,Ltd develops, produces, and sells furniture worldwide. It offers motion, power motion, and stationary sofas, as well as accent chairs, push back and lift recliners, and office chairs; and zaisu, thera, block, prado, X-space, puzzle, and delano products. The company was formerly known as Home Furnishing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ZOY Home Furnishing Co.,Ltd in November 2015. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Huzhou, China.
